availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Joshua B. Stallins (Caldwell Co, Ky, farmer)

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Louisa Nichols Stallins in Caldwell County, Kentucky, on September 29, 1846. Father of Mary Jane Stallins Carter, Mildred A. Stallins, Nancy Stallins, and Milton H. Stallins. Married to Barbary Ann Glass Stallins in Caldwell County on March 18, 1860. Father of W. A. Stallins and J. M. Stallins. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1850. Farmer in Princeton in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 2, p. 349A.

Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Bucksnort, p. 410A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Caldwell County Marriages, Film #000851644.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File #19948.
